sentence.text: In the present study, we investigated the spatiotemporal distributions of negative regulation of protein export from nucleus and 4 representative nucleoporins (GP210, NUP205, mRNA export from nucleus and NUP50) of NPCs in human Cu/Zn superoxide dismutase-1 mutation transgenic (response to superoxide-thyroid gland development) mice and sporadic ALS patients.

entity.text: negative regulation of protein export from nucleus

sentence.text: The present study indicated that the mislocalization of these proteins of NPCs may underlie the pathogenesis of signal transduction both in response to superoxide-Tg mice and human sporadic ALS patients, and these dysfunctions may be a fundamental pathway for ALS that is not specific only in C9-ALS but also in SOD1-ALS, which may be amenable to pharmacotherapeutic intervention
